channel.title: [508] [z508 PvP] RANDOM ERROR ON LOGIN GOIND CRAZY FFS
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at net.com.codeusa.model.Player.appendDeath(Player.java:2288) at net.com.codeusa.model.Player.process(Player.java:1893) at net.com.codeusa.Engine.run(Engine.java:183) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)[/code]
a person will login example [code] Connection from: 0.0.0.0 Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at net.com.codeusa.model.Player.appendDeath(Player.java:2288) at net.com.codeusa.model.Player.process(Player.java:1893) at net.com.codeusa.Engine.run(Engine.java:183) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)[/code]
then everyone laggs out for 5 mins.
